remarks: Version of ~ equsexh with a dv condition, which does not require ~ ax-13 .  Remark: the theorem ~ axc9lem2 has a dv version which is a simple consequence of ~ ax5e ; the theorems ~ nfeqf2 , ~ dveeq2 , ~ nfeqf1 , ~ dveeq1 , ~ nfeqf , ~ axc9 , ~ ax13 , have dv versions which are simple consequences of ~ ax-5 .  (Contributed by BJ, 31-May-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
